title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 194-1.5 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 194-1.5 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Part or the application thereof
to any person or circumstance is held invalid, such invalidity shall not affect
other provisions or applications of this Part which can be given effect without
the invalid provisions or applications. To this end, the provisions of this

Part are declared to be severable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
194-1.5

Adopted

New

York State Register February 1, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 05, eff. 2/1/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
